review: I have booked appointment for my grandmother and we have visited the hospital, Dr. Markandeya Akurathi was very friendly with us, and done the check up. After the check up he has prescribed for some onitment to take and it did not work up to the mark. There was no waiting time for us as we were only the patient on that day. I would like to recommend this doctor for other also.

The doctor was attentive when we were explaining the symptoms, does not rush his patients. Have visited him a few times for gastritis and a flu, he clarifies the cause and precautions we need to take *** **** *** ******* ********* ***********
** ********** ** ** ********* ********** We like the way he treated my father health issues. Now his blood sugars and thyroid levels came under control.

Went as an outpatient for fever, common cold and cough, doctor prescribed medicines (Antibiotics + Paracetamol + Mondeslor + cough syrup), medicines started working well but revisited the doctor for weakness , he advised to admit the patient citing pneumonia, hospitalised for a couple of days, prescribed scan, ********** ***** ****** **** ** ********* ******* ********** *** ***** * ***** **** *** ******* **** ***** ** ****** * ****** ******** **** ** **** **** ***** ********* ** * ****** ****** ***** *** ***** ***** *** ***** **** **** ***** * **** *** *** ******* ** ****** ***** ** * ****** ** *** ** ************ ** ** ** ***** ****** *** *** ****** We requested for a discharge but the doctor wasn’t ready and asked us to leave the hospital by taking full responsibility, the insurance department in Srinidhi hospital is the bad, they don’t help you, **** **** **** **** ***** *** ******* ******** ***** So we took the discharge as leave against medical advise and the patient is doing great within a week staying at home with no medication. I wouldn’t recommend this doctor, ** ***** **** ** ** ****** **** ** *** ******** ******** ** **** ***** ***** ** ****** *** ******* This is as per my personal experience,  extremely bad experience.

*** ****** **** *** **** *** **** ****** ** he gave the appointment at 10 AM but he came at 1130, we have to leave the clinic without consulting. they charged us 500 rs saying he will come in 5 mins at 10 AM and they didn't return the money as well
We recently consulted Dr markandeya for my wife diabetes treatment. He has given good care and addressed her health concerns  as well. I would strongly recommend him

Recently, consulted Dr. Markandeya regarding illness and  want to thank him for understanding the problem and prescribing the medication with good recovery by second consultation only. I personally want to thank Dr for the medical support especially on need.

** ********** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **********
Really a very good general physician with lot of patience. 
He is someone who never recommends unnecessary medicines and tests and genuinely care about improving your overall health.

**** **** ********** perfect medicine prescribed. 
I have sugar and cholesterol complaints.
Since4 years and taking regular advice .

It was nice meeting with right doctor for diagnosis. My wife is having diabetic issue and nurves problem. Dr. Markandeya is very friendly, listen the health issues very patience . He give right suggestions and medicines. Thanks
